text: The sun sets, the mushrooms wake up, and the danger increases.
$(br2)The zombies are coming and I don't mean the green ones.
$(br2)Mushrooms are nocturnal Plants, meaning that they can only function when it's dark.
$(br2)To make mushrooms you will need Mushroom Spores, they are acquired by putting together
various types of mushrooms together with purple dye. After that its time to look into your options.
$(br2)Sun-shrooms are important because Sunflowers produce small sun during night/rain/thunder/caves instead of the normal size.
$(br)Sun-shrooms have a random chance to produce small, normal, or large suns.
$(br2)Scaredy-shroom will deal with zombies from afar, helping thinning their numbers.
$(br2)Fume-shrooms are great at handling weak groups and shield zombies
$(br2)but struggle with tanky targets like bucketheads.
$(br)While these mushrooms are great for their cost, be mindful of depending on them at this stage of the game, as they will fall asleep during daytime.
$(br2)Coffee Beans can wake them during day time but aren't easy to make in large batches especially early on.
